summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. The road is relatively clear with some vehicles ahead. The vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position throughout the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is driving at a consistent speed, maintaining a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The vehicle is staying in its lane without any sudden changes in direction or speed.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red car, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same direction. 2) Front: A blue bus, approximately 30 meters away, moving steadily in the same direction.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road when a blue van suddenly cuts in from the left side, moving into the self-vehicles lane at a dangerously close distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is forced to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision with the blue van that has cut in from the left side. The vehicles speed decreases significantly over the last 0.3 seconds.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A blue van, approximately 1 meter away, cutting into the self-vehicles lane abruptly.
